data.text: @DoctorsManitoba You lied to everyone for 2 years. False prophet.
@DoctorsManitoba Find fresh air? This has to be a parody account
@DoctorsManitoba Even CNN running backwards on masks now...not MB Doctor's though...you can count the bodies on the mask hill and they are lying motionless.
@DoctorsManitoba When SNL starts poking fun at mask mandates, the war is over
